name: Where are you?
description:
Story: 

Our main character will find himself in a lost temple, where he' ll have to escape, with the players help. Interact with platforms, avoid lasers, and use them to activate mechanisms. Help our character escape from the emple alive, and solve a lot of puzzles!!!

  • Get to know us!

Developers:

-Pau Masip

-Albert Morquecho

Artists:

-Mayte Martínez

-Arnau Olivella

-Quim Montsant

  • Follow us on our social media!:

Twitter - Lullaby Studios

Instagram - Lullaby Studios

  • Our project is still on development, and its currently at its BETA fase, but it will be available soon! Don't forget to look after it, there's a lot of levels full of fun awaiting you! :)
Level 1 - Welcome to the temple!
